original_text: In the three and twentieth year of Nebuchadrezzar Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard carried away captive of the Jews seven hundred forty and five persons: all the persons were four thousand and six hundred.
korean_text: 느부갓네살의 제이십삼년에 사령관 느부사라단이 사로잡아 간 유다 사람이 칠백사십오 명이니 그 총수가 사천육백 명이더라

sentences.original_text: In the three and twentieth year of Nebuchadrezzar
Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard
carried away captive of the Jews
seven hundred forty and five persons
all the persons were four thousand and six hundred
